description:
<Features>

● Fast-paced Gameplay
Precise and speedy movement and controls.

● Genuine Backgammon Rules
This software follows the official rules of Backgammon.

● Streaming Capabilities
Contains cursor display features for clear online streams.

● Fast but Clever
A strong but quick-thinking AI utilizing machine learning technology.

Enjoyable for all levels from beginner to professional!

<Game Modes>

● Offline Match
CPU match. Offline match with one Nintendo Switch™. You can set optional rules freely.

● Online Match
・ Free match (rating is not affected)
・ Rating match (rating is affected based on performance)
・ Password match (rating is not affected)
* Online matches are automatically matched. You can select a 1P match with a 5P cube.

● Tutorial
An illustrated tutorial that explains the basic rules. You can also check during gameplay.

● Game Record Analysis
Use AI to analyze gameplay.

● Clock & Score Board
A clock and scoreboard that can be used when playing real-life Backgammon.
name: BACKGAMMON PRO for Nintendo Switch
